tool.name: tl.pca
tool.description: Computes PCA (principal component analysis) coordinates, loadings and variance decomposition
tool.help:
Computes PCA coordinates, loadings and variance decomposition, using the implementation of *scikit-learn*.
More details on the `scanpy documentation <https://scanpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/scanpy.api.tl.pca.html#scanpy.api.tl.pca>`__
